dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.product.offer.price.PriceEvent
dataStructure.description:
An occurrence (happening) or schedule that triggers the creation of a billing charge for a product offering. For example, a price event instance may represent the end of a month when monthly recurring billing charges are created. In some cases, the creation of a charge associated with a ProductOfferingPrice may be triggered by multiple events. For example, a penalty (ProductOfferingPrice) may be triggered by over- or under-usage of a service. Under- and over-usage are represented as two separate PriceEvent entity instances.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: PriceEvent

child.name: productOfferingPrice
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association ComponentProdOfferPriceGovernedBy

This association end is optional
child.label: productOfferingPrice
